message.say: By the ominous atmosphere and big open space, I'd say it's not over yet.
It sounds like you're going to be fighting something huge right about now.
Since I know you probably aren't prepared, I'll give you armor.
Ew, is that virtual saliva? I just washed this screen!
What's worse is that the CPU is right outside!
Well, you're on your own! Sayonara, stranger!
